welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wevelgem, a charming city known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore our lovely city and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kortrijk Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Kortrijk Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
